description: React component 'CategoriesSidebar' that renders a sidebar with clickable category buttons. It manages navigation via URL hash updates, supports keyboard accessibility, and interacts with parent components via callback.

methods.name: CategoriesSidebar({ categories, active, onSelect })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar with categories, handling navigation and accessibility.

methods.name: navigateToCategory
methods.description: Updates URL hash to navigate to the selected category and invokes the onSelect callback.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard events to allow Enter/Space keys to trigger category navigation.

ctags.name: CategoriesSidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function CategoriesSidebar({ categories, active, onSelect }) {$/
